name: Slide A Fruit
description:
Slide a Fruit is an exciting fresh take on the classic match 3 puzzle genre, brought to you by the makers of Quip! and Switch Cross.

Match blocks in dazzling combinations of 3 or more to earn bonus combo points!

Slide a Fruit is an easy to learn, hard to master game filled with colorful characters and blocks.

Compete against your friends around the world on Android and iOS in this addictive Slide a Lama homage.

Slide a Fruit is completely free to play, so download it now and challenge a friend!

Have fun and thank you for downloading Slide a Fruit!
